api_config.title: IntelliFire - API Configuration
api_config.description:
IntelliFire will need to reach out to [iftapi.net](https://iftapi.net/webaccess/login.html) in order to obtain an API key. Once it has obtained this API key, the rest of its interactions will occur compeltely within the local network. If the API key were to expire it would again need to reach out to https://iftapi.net/webaccess/login.html

Username and password are the same information used in your IntelliFire Android/iOS application.
